name: Big Cheese
description:
Big Cheese is a company dedicated to the development of software and consultancy services, conformed by highly qualified and experienced IT professionals. We understand our relationship with customers as a commitment to improve your business processes; we work together to identify your needs and, in that way, offer an integral solution.
Our products are distinguished by their strong element of design, usability and user experience. We have a line of basic products for the management of your company, such as stock management, billing system, and Human Resources recruitment system, among others.
